verses.roman:
navamo dakṣa-sāvarṇir
manur varuṇa-sambhavaḥ
bhūtaketur dīptaketur
ity ādyās tat-sutā nṛpa

synonyms: navamaḥ—ninth; dakṣa-sāvarṇiḥ—Dakṣa-sāvarṇi; manuḥ—the Manu; varuṇa-sambhavaḥ—born as the son of Varuṇa; bhūtaketuḥ—Bhūtaketu; dīptaketuḥ—Dīptaketu; iti—thus; ādyāḥ—and so on; tat—his; sutāḥ—sons; nṛpa—O King.
translation: O King, the ninth Manu will be Dakṣa-sāvarṇi, who is born of Varuṇa. Among his sons will be Bhūtaketu, and Dīptaketu.
